metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2172 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
DokuWiki before 2014-05-05d and before 2014-09-29c does not properly check permissions for the ACL plugins, which allows remote authenticated users to gain privileges and add or delete ACL rules via a request to the XMLRPC API.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> Vulnerability is in XMLRPC API that is marked experimental and off by default

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1').
